pages.about-us: About Frigidaire - Your Destination for Reliable Refrigerators Frigidaire HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Cooling Solutions for Your Home Discover the perfect refrigeration solutions for your home with our range of high-quality refrigerators. From compact options for small spaces to deluxe models with advanced features, we offer solutions tailored to your cooling needs. VIEW REFRIGERATORS Refrigeration Solutions for Smart Homes and Motorhomes In an era of increasing mobility and travel enthusiasm, ensuring food freshness in smart homes and motorhomes is essential. Frigidaire offers comprehensive refrigeration solutions tailored specifically for motorhomes and campers. With a wide range of options available, we provide separate refrigerator models for motorhomes and campers to ensure that your smart lifestyle is supported wherever you go. VIEW REFRIGERATORS Cooling Solutions for Refrigerated Vehicles Frigidaire offers reliable cooling solutions tailored specifically for refrigerated vehicles used in transportation and delivery services. Our refrigeration units are designed to maintain consistent temperatures, ensuring the freshness of perishable goods during transit. pages.privacy-policy: Frigidaire Privacy Policy - Your Privacy and Data Security Matters to Us Frigidaire HOME ABOUT US Products Contact Privacy Policy Introduction This Privacy Policy describes how Frigidaire collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our website and services. Information We Collect We collect personal information such as name, email address, phone number, and address when you interact with our website or contact us for inquiries or purchases. How We Use Your Information We use your information to process your inquiries, orders, and provide customer support. We may also use your information to send promotional emails or newsletters if you have opted in to receive them. Data Security We take appropriate measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. Changes to This Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page. Contact Us If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at frigidaire@gmail.com. Frigidaire website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our site.
